Blog.post: Today I saw White Chicks the funniest ever it was funny as hello I just wanted 2 give good promotion ok

I went 2 Tennis today and right before I went i at Catfish and Hot sauce from Catfish Willys I went out I was fellin O.K. and It got Hot as Hell it mustve been me playin because when I play im in the zone so I feel Quizzy alll of a sudden then i went to sit down wuth my mom and throwup was comin up my throat and I put my hand up and it came right on out and splatted everywhereon my new shirt on my pants arms everywhere even on my face. Well thats the Highlight of my Day

my mom was behind me and we wee about 2 watcha movie so here is yesterday and the day before yesterdaay The day before yesterday Isaiah came over 2 the ultimate bachelor pad of a house we went ridin everywhere even 2 his house I shol wasnt about to go in his house he has a dog and i do not deal wit dogs puppys cool but dogs hell no Yesterdday we went to pick up my grandma from Lousiana and our waterpump broke in Garrison Texas and we had to stay there for 2 and a half hours because my dad insisted on ridin in my grandmas 999993333 Cadillac sedan deville no part stores in Garrison I had 2 stay with the car and protect my mom (like I could do somethin).i ddnt go to sleep until 3:00 am oh and DDDETROIIIITT WWOOOOOONNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN
Today I have painted my front gate 2 my court yard and cleaned my pool so Isaiah can swim because he came over and wanted to swim ill type more later

I would Like to Start off with I HAVE TO GET BBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAACCCCCCCEEEEEEEEESSSSSSS. I have to get braces the nurse says Braceeeeesssss O well better now then later I will get them clear but then I cant eat what I want MMMMMMMAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNI have 1 cavity from eatin so much candy I am eatin a ButterFinger Oh well fillin those only cost 30 dollars I miss my sister she has been gone for 4 days its so quiet in this huge house I am started to get scared Only 3 people this week next 2 Everyoneone is leaving AAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH

Today might have been the dullest day all summer all I did was play NBA Ballers all-day Well every Wednesday I get to go bowling with a few friends that would be fun. At least my sister wont be around for 23 days shes goin to Europe while I stay here with my parents and maybe...... hopefully....... prolly...... go to Cancun or LA. My Grandma gave me $50 and my sister more I wonder how much but Im grateful for what I got so I wont worry about it. O well Ill find somrthin to do on the internet maybe pogo.com or cokemusic

Today is Wed. I have to go to church and help clean it up For some reson I wake up at 6:00 in the morning No good TV shows so I just do crunches and lift weights and now i am feeling the after effects My Grandma just left out the house for the third time first she forgot her car keys then her check book then left her door key I have the new Yahoo Messenger but for some reason I cant put clothes on my Avatar ( a little person in corner of screen) Plus the y dont have a caramel color it even has insults and goodbyes Isaiah should know I laid some on him hahahahahahahhahaha My eyes are glazin over so I should go Peace Love and Happiness

I have Blog now anytime someone gets somethin I have 2 get it its a habit I can sum up summer so far in 1 word BBBOOORRIIIINNGGGGG Isaiah made us lose a tennis match against my sister and someone who played 1 time HHHHEEEEEEEE IIIIIIIISSSSSSSSS SSSSSSSOOOOOOOORRRRRRYYYYY Today all the pep in band went to practice I dont think I am goin to be in Marchin band in 9th O well
